Whilst building spaceplanes I've realised that when my SAS refuses to point at my targets (prograde, retrograde etc) it's usually because I've forgotten to reset my trim (alt-x). 

I wonder if this is the cause of some of the issues people have seen with SAS. If you've intentionally or unintentionally pressed alt whilst flying your rocket and SAS is aimlessly drifting your vessel, try alt-x.
Alt+X resets trim? Did not know that.. I'm going to put it in the tips and tricks.
